Biography


I've always really enjoyed computers and tech. In high school, I taught myself some programming on a graphing calculator by making a simple Bomberman game. Throughout my 20's, I've done all sorts of computer working including building computers, designing networks, video editing, and recording music.


I've spent the last 2 years acquiring an AAS degree in Computer Programming and completing several separate online Computer Science courses. My goal is to be a Full Stack Web Developer at a company that values learning and improving, as well as making high quality products.
